long_description: The NEW Bass & Trout Kit contains 6 of our deadliest bass and trout lures. This great spinning lure kit features 6 Panther Martin spinning lures in 6 assorted bass and trout colors - all in 1/4 oz./ #6 size. These are all lures proven to catch bass and trout, based on our 52 years experience of fishing and selling these great lures. Nicely packed in a reusable lure case, this 6-pack is an incredible value.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
